thread.title: Microsoft Reports Gains in Cloud-Computing Business

author: Jay Greene
title: Microsoft Reports Gains in Cloud-Computing Business
text:
Microsoft Corp. took a $13.8 billion charge related to the new U.S. tax law but reported significant growth in its cloud operations, the business fueling the companyâ€™s resurgence.
Microsoft keeps overseas the vast majority of its cash, which rose to $142.8 billion in the quarter. In an interview, Chief Financial Officer Amy Hood declined to say when the company might bring home some of that money.
